Parenthood-76.op_claim: I believe that parents who hit their children are criminals and should be charged with assault, including the ones who disguise the abuse as "spanking". CMV.

reply_contents.content: What's wrong with hitting your child
elo_info: What's wrong with hitting your child

reply_contents.content: First of all, I agree that your anger doesn't justify hitting a child, or anyone else for that matter
elo_info: First of all, I agree that your anger doesn't justify hitting a child, or anyone else for that matter

reply_contents.content: Hitting someone in anger is abuse, plain and simple
elo_info: Hitting someone in anger is abuse, plain and simple

reply_contents.content: However, hitting your child as a reasoned punishment is totally fine
elo_info: However, hitting your child as a reasoned punishment is totally fine

reply_contents.content: It's unpleasant enough to be a deterrent yet not actually harmful
elo_info: It's unpleasant enough to be a deterrent yet not actually harmful

reply_contents.content: My parents used their slippers on my butt for discipline, and I can tell you right now, I don't actually remember it hurting
elo_info: My parents used their slippers on my butt for discipline, and I can tell you right now, I don't actually remember it hurting

reply_contents.content: I'm sure it did, but I don't remember that
elo_info: I'm sure it did, but I don't remember that

reply_contents.content: The whole thing was theater -- my parent was upset with something I did, and it was very clear what that thing was and I knew it was coming
elo_info: The whole thing was theater -- my parent was upset with something I did, and it was very clear what that thing was and I knew it was coming

reply_contents.content: I didn't like it, obviously, but that was the point
elo_info: I didn't like it, obviously, but that was the point

reply_contents.content: But note what I did not have: bruises, broken bones, broken skin, PTSD
elo_info: But note what I did not have: bruises, broken bones, broken skin, PTSD

reply_contents.content: No harm done whatsoever
elo_info: No harm done whatsoever

reply_contents.content: I did not live in fear of my parents
elo_info: I did not live in fear of my parents

reply_contents.content: The spanking was very obviously (to me as a child) linked to my behavior; I knew exactly why it was happening
elo_info: The spanking was very obviously (to me as a child) linked to my behavior; I knew exactly why it was happening

reply_contents.content: And, of course, it was over very quickly -- much, much, much better than being grounded
elo_info: And, of course, it was over very quickly -- much, much, much better than being grounded

reply_contents.content: You are allowed to refuse most medical care for your children; the exceptions are medical care that is needed to the best understanding of medical science
elo_info: You are allowed to refuse most medical care for your children; the exceptions are medical care that is needed to the best understanding of medical science

reply_contents.content: Care that is merely a little helpful (erythromycin in the eyes of newborns, well-child checkups, circumcision, treatment of scrapes/bruises, tonsillectomy for moderate snoring, etc etc) are the parents' decision
elo_info: Care that is merely a little helpful (erythromycin in the eyes of newborns, well-child checkups, circumcision, treatment of scrapes/bruises, tonsillectomy for moderate snoring, etc) are the parents' decision

elo_info.message: Possible typo: you repeated a word

reply_contents.content: They are not criminals for disagreeing with a doctor; they are forced to comply with doctors only when the evidence is clear and compelling
elo_info: They are not criminals for disagreeing with a doctor; they are forced to comply with doctors only when the evidence is clear and compelling

reply_contents.content: Spanking (outside of real child abuse) is not illegal, so the use of the word "criminal" is misleading
elo_info: Spanking (outside of real child abuse) is not illegal, so the use of the word “criminal” is misleading

elo_info.message: Use a smart opening quote here: '“'.
Use a smart closing quote here: '”'.

reply_contents.content: Furthermore, it has been shown to cause problems only when done excessively (>2 times per month or so, depending on the study)
elo_info: Furthermore, it has been shown to cause problems only when done excessively (>2 times per month or so, depending on the study)

reply_contents.content: So why are you up in arms against every instance of spanking
elo_info: So why are you up in arms against every instance of spanking
